channel.title: Korasi special icon damage
channel.description:
Well when you do the korasi special on a PvP or PvN it shows the melee icon damage hit. I want to make it show the magic hit icon spirit not the melee.
I mite not of explained this right or not enough, But I really am clueless on how to go about fixing this.

item.title: Korasi special icon damage
item.dc:creator: @stefano1911 stefano1911
item.description:
@stefano1911 wrote:

the reason its shows the melee hit is because it is hitting with melee not with magic make the korasi sword special hit with magic it will show the magic icon

Read full topic
